title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4207.10 - Electric or mechanical annunciators
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4207.10 - Electric or mechanical annunciators

State Regulations

Racing associations shall install at their tracks and
adequately maintain electric or mechanical annunciators for the purpose of
displaying the numbers of the placed horses at the conclusion of each
race. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4207.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
